runs.comm: short in length and outside off stump, Gibbs is beaten as he tries to punch it through the off side. Kamran appeals loudly but Razzaq is not interested
moves away from the off stump line, glided down to third man
full in length around off stump line, Smith leans forward to push it cautiously to covers
shuffles to the off side and clips it towards deep square-leg from the off stump line
moves down the track, Razzaq shortens the length, tapped to the on side
length delivery outside off, punched to covers
slips to the pads, clipped to deep backward square-leg region for couple of runs
short in length, skids through Smith's pull shot. Akmal appeals for a catch and again gets no support from the bowler. No edge on that one.
drifts to the pads and Smith clips it past the short fine-leg fielder and the ball runs to the boundary
on the middle and leg line, flicked past square-leg
around the off stump line, pushed out to point
short in length, Gibbs goes for the pull shot and the ball runs of the inner edge to left of Razzaq at short fine-leg region
length delivery, drives on the up to point .. direct hit at the non-striker's end but Smith is home
slower one, full delivery on the off stump line, eased down to long-off
on the middle stump line, Smith shuffles across to clip it to deep square-leg region

It's short in length and Gibbs goes for the pull shot. For a moment you thought he had cleared midwicket and will collect a four. But Misbah, at midwicket, leaped to haul the ball back down! Early strike for Pakistan.
full in length, Kallis stays back and mistimes the punch to covers
Imperious! Kallis walks down the track and plays a lovely square-drive to pick up a boundary.
full in length, eased to right of mid-off .. direct hit from Afridi but the batsman is home
leans across to defend a length delivery to covers
low full toss well outside off, Kallis reaches across to slice it to Salman at third man
length delivery on the off stump line, Smith gets forward to defend it back to the bowler
tries the yorker but serves a full pitched delivery on middle and leg, flicked away for a single
slower one outside off, steered towards third man for a single.
quickish, on the middle stump line, tapped to square-leg
turns in towards pads. clipped past short fine-leg fielder
turns towards the leg, Smith doesn't connect with the sweep and it bounds off the pads just over Kamran
Another tame dismissal. Smith tried to force a short delivery over mid-on but ends up pushing tamely to Afridi. What a soft dismissal.
quickish on the middle and leg, tapped to point for a single
on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
length delivery around off, pushed to cover
length delivery, eased past the non-striker
length delivery straightens outside off, runs of the edge to third man
shuffles to the off side and works it through midwicket
Nicely done. It was a short in length delivery just outside off stump, Kallis waits, opens the bat-face and late cuts it well to the left of the short third-man fielder
jumps down the track and Hafeez shortens the length, pushed out to midwicket
full delivery on the off, eased to long-on
full outside off, pushed past point for a single
on the middle and off line, on driven to long-on
just outside off stump, tapped to backward point
stays back to punch it down to long-on for another single. Just five runs there.
skidder on the middle stump line, cut away to short third man ..
gets down the track and cuts the short ball to backward point
gets forward to drive to left of long-off where Umar swoops on the ball
quickish skidder just outside off, chopped to Aamer at short third man
on the off stump line, googly, edges the off drive towards long-on
outside off stump, cut to deep backward point region. The required rate continues to climb
on the middle stump line, nudged to the off side
pushes it well down the leg side and Kamran does well to jump to his left to take it
on the off and middle, driven to sweeper cover
on the leg stump line, flicked for a single
picks another single down to sweeper cover
moves down the track , the bowler shortens the length and AB merely taps it back to the bowler
on the leg stump line, swept to right of short fine-leg where Razzaq makes a diving stop
Drama He goes for the paddle scoop over the keeper's head .. the ball bounds of Kamran's shoulder and almost carries to short third man where Aamer throws in a dive but can't reach
picks a single down to deep cover
reaches forward to on drive to long-on
Another paddle-scoop over Kamran attempted! But this time no wood on leather
and this time Afridi slows up the pace, AB mistimes the off drive back to the bowler
Just a single down to long-on
goes for the reverse sweep and top edges it over short third man
presses back to clip it past square-leg
moves down the track and flicks it between deep square-leg and deep midwicket
quicker one outside off, dabbed to short third man where Salman doesn't stop cleanly
What a fab catch from Umar! Kallis shoveled a short-of-length delivery towards long-on and Umar charged ahead and dived full stretch to take a lovely catch
on the off and middle line, dabbed to backward square-leg
reaches forward to drive it wide of sweeper cover for three runs
leans forward to nudge it to square-leg for a single
stays back to cut it to backward point
stays back to clip the short-of-length skidder past square-leg
plays the slog sweep .. just a single to deep midwicket
pitched outside leg stump, skids in to beat the attempted flick and strikes the pad
moves down the track and flicks ti wide of Razzaq at short fine-leg
slips this down the leg side. Ab threatened to charge down the track and the bowler over adjusted
leans forward to dab it to midwicket

Caught at deep midwicket! Duminy goes for the hoick to the on side  but is beaten in the flight. He hits it straight up .. and Khalid moves in from deep midwicket to take the catch. SA hurtle further into the abyss.
taps this one to point for a single
on the leg and middle line, eased past midwicket
on the leg stump line, punches it to long-on
flighted outside off stump, driven to deep cover
floated full outside off, chopped to right of short third man
reaches forward to square-drive to deep backward point region
fetches it from outside off and drags it to right of long-on for couple of runs
outside off stump line, cut down to sweeper cover
this one skids in .. Boucher is clueless, is surprised by the inward movement and ends up stabbing it to the on side
stays back to punch it wide of long-on for another couple of runs
goes for the sweep shot, it bounces over the middle stump line and Akmal doesn't collect it cleanly. Was there an edge? The replays aren't conclusive. BAd angles basically
Slap! A four after a long long while. He backed away to play a feisty cut shot
And a six this time! He moves down the track and lifts it over long-on. Fine strike.
Thrash! He moves to 50 with a fiercely carved hit over long-off! And he lets out a roar
moves down the track and flicks it for another two runs;. He has used the big boundary to collect lots of twos here
rotates the strike with a dab to midwicket
outside off stump, cuts it to third man
stays back to dab it to short fine-leg

AB was hitting superbly down the ground. But this time he goes for the paddle scoop over the keeper's head and fails. He only ended up scooping the topspinner straight up and Kamran turns back to take a simple catch. What a big moment this.
short in length, turning to the middle and leg, doesn't connect with the pull shot
straightens on the off and middle, dabbed to square-leg
full delivery around off stump line, driven to long-off
full delivery, flicked to deep midwicket

drops it short, pulled really hard past the umpire Doctrove at square-leg.. Doctrove just about manages to sway away from the line of fire. Reminds me of RIchie Richardson sweeping and hitting the umpire at square-leg in the 1996 world cup.
pushes this one to backward square-leg for a single
full and straight, driven down to long-on
gets forward to on drive to long-on for a single
Crunchy. He goes for the sweep and connects well. The ball screams over the square-leg umpire!
goes for the slog sweep but doesn't connect
Trapped in front!  Bouch tried to work this one to the on side but played all around it. Pakistan inch close to the victory line
Reverse sweep! He wallops this one over backward point
quicker one outside off, driven to long-on for a single
Crashed! Full pitched just outside the off stump line and Botha thrashes it to wide long-off boundary
fuller, around off, uppish drive just short of the driving Misbah at cover

Ouch! Full toss on the leg stump line, Albie goes for the swing to the on side, misses it and is hit on the groin. Ouchy! Albie is down on the ground in pain. Physio rushes out. It was a full toss and probably deserved to fly out of the boundary but instead ...
full delivery, mistimes the intended big hit and the ball rolls to long-on
Botha is playing a cameo here. He leans across to paddle-sweep a length delivery over Razzaq at short fine-leg
full pitched delivery outside off, Botha tries to crash it over covers but edges it over the short third-man fielder. 17 to win from the final over. Here we go!
top spinner from round the stumps on the middle stump line, Albie is cramped for room as he doesn't pick the ball coming in ... ends up stabbing it gently to the off side
low dipping full delivery, hit down to long-off
around the off stump line, cut straight to backward point. Just a single.

Done in by the doosra! Ajmal strikes for Pakistan. It broke away from Botha, who went for the slog sweep, and Akmal did the rest. Botha had stretched out his back leg outside the crease. He played well but the big hits came too late for South Africa.
slows up the pace, shortens the length, pulled over midwicket for couple of runs. Kamran Akmal celebrates. Gloom in the  SA dressing room
lovely doosra that breaks away like a big leg break to Akmal. Pakistan have done their bit to stay in the competition while South Africa go home. Congrats Pakistan!
